title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.13 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.13 - Confidentiality

State Regulations
(a) Confidential
treatment of information required. The certified provider shall treat as
confidential all information regarding a youth's participation in the program
with the exception of information required by the courts and/or the
division. (b) Policies and
procedures. The certified provider shall provide each participating youth with
a written explanation of the types of information that will be provided to the
referring court and the circumstances under which such information will be
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14

343.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
